key_risks: Market volatility due to focus on smaller-cap Japanese equities
Currency risk from JPY/USD exchange rate fluctuations
Regulatory and tax risks from changes in Japanese policies
Dependency on external management by Nomura Asset Management U.S.A. Inc.
controversies: Potential discrepancies between NAV and market price indicating market mispricing
Engagement with SEC regarding shareholder proposals
governance_issues: Reliance on external management for portfolio strategy
